#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define for(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;++i)
#define m 1000000007
#define rfor(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>b;--i)
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int count[30],i,len;
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	len=s.length();
	for(i,0,30)
		count[i]=0;
	for(i,0,len)
	{
		count[(int)(s[i]-'a')+1]++;
	}
	if(count[9]>=1 && count[12]>=1 && count[15]>=2 && count[22]>=1 && count[5]>=1 && count[25]>=1 && count[21]>=1)
		cout<<"happy"<<endl;
	else
		cout<<"sad"<<endl;
	return 0;
}
